data.name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Aegyptus & Creta
data.detailed_description:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Aegyptus and Cretathat add variety and new challenges to the game:

  • üê™ Aegyptus is a 22 City, 10 Province map that introduces trade routes that may be occupied by more than one Colonist, a flood mechanic that increases food yields, and additional trade for francincense and gold.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Creta is a small 20 City, 9 Province map that introduces a variable production 1 City Province.

Take this golden opportunity to beat new challenges in Concordia today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707534/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Aegyptus__Creta/

data.short_description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Aegyptus and Creta with their unique mechanics - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Italian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
